page.title: 03Trevor Morgan Pt 2
page.content: At 1.15p.m.we come back to the classroom.Then we go over to watch "A Place to Live"on T.V.It's about insects and animals and it is very interesting.At about 2.30p.m.we have Craft with Mr.Watson.At the moment we are making baskets.School ends at 3.35 p.m.for most people,but for me it ends at 4.15 because I stay for table tennis.By the time I get home it is 4.30p.m.I get changed into my playing clothes and go out to play on my bike around the streets.At 5.30p.m.it's time for tea.After tea I go back out. At 7.20p.m.I come in and change into my shorts and tracksuit and at 7.40 p.m.I am ready to go to table tennis at Oxstalls School.I get there for 7.55p.m.At 9.30p.m.we finish table tennis and play handball.Then at 10.00 p.m.my dad comes and picks me up.I get home at about 10.15p.m.and go to bed.
